citation.article-title: Methanosphaera stadtmaniae gen. nov., sp. nov.: a species that forms methane by reducing methanol with hydrogen.

p.s: Description of Methanosphaera stadtmaniae sp. nov.

Methanosphaera stadtmaniae (stadt, man i. ae. N. L. Gen. n. stadtmaniae of Stadtman; named in honor of Thressa C. Stadtman for her important contributions to the microbiology and biochemistry of methanogenesis)
The type strain is MCB-3 (= DSM 3091).
The descriptions for the type species and type strain are the same as the description given above for the genus.
The type strain was isolated from human feces
